_sText:
This is a small-medium sized map.

Recommended # of players: ABOUT 20

Spawn points in map: 48 (24 CT 24 T)

This XMAS map in a way that takes place in the year 1 AD (Jesus' birth... Christmas)


Mission: (and story)


Terrorist (or the Demonic Satan Worshipers), you have built a time machine to go back to the year 1 AD. Your mission is to eliminate the Counter-Terrorists (the CHURCH) and by doing so, leave yourselves open to kill Mary when she comes. You must kill ALL the CHURCH members!

Counter Terrorist (or the CHURCH), you heard about the Demonic Satan Worshipers building a time machine... so you built your own. You are now in Bethlehem and you must eliminate the Demonic Satan Worshipers, and stop them from eliminating Mary and by doing so erasing Jesus from history... (NO there is NOT a Mary in this map!) lol

<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-< NOTE >-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>-<>

KEEP AN EYE OUT FOR MY NEW MAP: DE_COLDFIRE WILL BE RELEASED LATE '06 OR VERY EARLY '07. FOR MORE INFORMATION ABOUT DE_COLDFIRE, VISIT MY WEBSITE: WWW.KILLERWORMDESIGN.CO.NR
